title: Zillow Wilting Under Web Real Estate Competition
text:
Brooklyn Homesellers Name Their Prices And Get More 
For prospective homebuyers in Brooklyn, an asking price is just a starting point. In the second quarter, half of the homes that sold in New York's most populous borough did so at or above their listed price as the supply of properties failed to keep up with demand, according to a report Thursday by ... 07/30/2015 06:21 PM ET Rents Are Up, But Is Robust Apartment Growth At Risk? 
Buttressed by high occupancy rates, apartment landlords in many U.S. markets are aggressively hiking rents at a rate that many commercial real estate experts believe is unsustainable as their competition grows. Developers are beginning to add new units at a pace that's outstripping demand, and more ... 07/09/2015 05:25 PM ET Home Prices Rising, But Builders Pinched 
U.S. home prices will rise moderately this year and next as demand picks up but inventory stays low, a panel of housing economists said Friday. Rents rising, perhaps faster, are expected to benefit landlords, while homebuilders undergo a continuing profit pinch. After a 6% gain the last 12 months, ... 06/26/2015 02:00 PM ET Where Are The Next Tech-Fueled Real Estate Markets? 
Job-hungry and space-guzzling tech companies have driven up real estate values to staggering levels in California's San Francisco Bay Area and Silicon Valley. Now they're rattling other markets — from Seattle to Boston and south to Austin, Texas — as companies stretch beyond tech's ... 06/25/2015 04:57 PM ET Roger Ailes To Stay At Helm Of 21st Century Fox 
Share of 21st Century Fox (NASDAQ:FOXA) rose early Thursday after the company announced that Roger Ailes signed a multiyear contract to continue as chairman and CEO of Fox News, which he founded and led to the No. 1 position in network news. Ailes also retains the titles of Fox Business Network CEO ... 06/25/2015 01:03 PM ET Flying cameras to lift GoPro stock, Citi says 
GoPro (NASDAQ:GPRO) is set to fly, as the maker of tiny action cameras enters the drone business early next year, Citi Research analyst Jeremy David said in a research report Thursday. David upgraded GoPro stock to buy from neutral and raised his price target to 90 from 63, based on GoPro's ... 04:22 PM ET Apple Vendor Synaptics Falls On Earnings, Outlook 
A disappointing earnings report drove shares of Synaptics (NASDAQ:SYNA) to fall to a seven-month low Friday, though the stock rallied later in the session. The Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) touchscreen supplier late Thursday reported earnings for its fiscal Q4 ended June 30 that missed Wall Street ... 04:10 PM ET Aloha, New Highs: 2 Hot Travel Stocks Break Out 
Two travel-related companies are breaking out Friday after issuing estimate-beating quarterly earnings: Expedia (NASDAQ:EXPE) and Royal Caribbean Cruises (NYSE:RCL). The travel site gapped up to a new high in huge volume in the stock market today, breaking out of a flat base with a 115.10 buy ... 03:42 PM ET Amgen Stock Hits High As Street Eyes Growth Drivers 
Big biotech Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) hit a new high in early trading Friday and got several price-target increases from analysts after its strong Q2 and guidance increase late Thursday. Cowen analyst Eric Schmidt raised his price target to 193 from 189 based not only on Thursday's numbers, but also on ... 03:35 PM ET Outerwall falls as Redbox DVD rental business weakens 
Outerwall (NASDAQ:OUTR) stock dropped through the floor on Friday, a day after the Redbox parent reported declining DVD rentals from its kiosks.
